name: UpdateGithubRequiredWorkflow
description:
Update a required workflow in a GitHub organization.

This tool updates a specified required workflow within a GitHub organization. It requires an access token with `admin:org` scope for authentication.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: required_workflow_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the required workflow to update in the organization.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the required workflow.

parameters.name: repository_id_for_workflow
parameters.description: The ID of the repository containing the workflow file to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the repository that contains the workflow file.

parameters.name: workflow_scope
parameters.description: Specify the repository scope for enabling the workflow: 'all' for all repositories or 'selected' for specific ones within the organization.

value_schema.description: Enable the required workflow for all repositories or selected repositories in the organization.

parameters.name: repository_ids_for_workflow
parameters.description: List of repository IDs to enable the required workflow. Applicable only if `scope` is `selected`.

value_schema.description: A list of repository IDs where you want to enable the required workflow. A list of repository IDs where you want to enable the required workflow. You can only provide a list of repository ids when the `scope` is set to `selected`.

parameters.name: workflow_file_path
parameters.description: Path to the workflow file to be set as a required workflow in the organization.

value_schema.description: Path of the workflow file to be configured as a required workflow.
